name: Pen Factori 2
description:
Gameplay: You click to get ink and materials for crafting and selling pens. You can go for as long as you want and get millions of dollars! Or just stop when you get the best ink and material providers.

Story: This is a remastered version of my previous (and first) Pen Factori game. After a couple years of learning and growing, I decided to do the older (and, let's be honest, worse) game some justice by remaking and remastering the idea.

Notes: game will auto-save your progress.
